settings.code:
Our Story

One-of-a-kind-tech accessories.
Handcrafted from nature's finest materials.

Since 2009 we've been trying to do something a little different. In an industry consisting of a sea of sameness, we craft one-of-a-kind tech accessories from nature's finest materials. Our goal is that every Cover-Up product gives a sense of individuality that matches your own. From wood and stone to wool felt, our products feature a uniqueness and long lasting quality that can only be found in our natural surroundings.

settings.subtitle: OUR MISSION
settings.title: Making work a little more enjoyable.
settings.text:
No flashy logos. No senseless details. Just handcrafted products that are made naturally and designed simply. But you'd never call them boring.

Thanks to nature, every case, skin or desk pad is different, each with it's own unique pattern, texture or patina.

We're here to make every day a little bit better. We do this by transforming your device or workspace, and most importantly putting smiles on people's faces with our products!

settings.subtitle: Materials Matter
settings.title: Better materials means better products
settings.text:
We use the best of what nature has to offer - from wood, stone, seashell and merino wool to make products that will last for the long haul.

Our products get even better as they age, and cases and skins often outlast our customers phones and MacBooks.

settings.subtitle: OUR PROCESS
settings.title: Crafted in Wales
settings.text:
Quality matters. We don’t make a big thing of it, but our customers know and appreciate the difference.  

From our small workshop that we call home our products are designed and manufactured by people who care.

We love to do more with less because everyone knows that less is more. And, we sweat the small stuff. Small things matter. They add up. Then, they turn into big things.

settings.subtitle: MADE RESPONSIBLY
settings.title: We use only the good stuff
settings.text:
We might only be small but we know we can have a big impact. In an industry where most products are made from plastic, we decided to make things a little more naturally.

We love to do more with less because everyone knows that less is more. And through our products, processes and packaging we're actively working towards having a positive impact on the planet.

We want to make a difference, even if it's just a small one.

settings.title: Happiness Guarantee
settings.text:
We think our products look even better in person than they do on screen. And we stand behind everything we make.

Not completely happy with your purchase? Just let us know - our Happiness Guarantee has you covered.
Be the first to know about all things Cover-Up — think special releases, first access to limited editions and sale events. Yup, all the good stuff. Put your name on the list here.

settings.disclaimer: Note: You can opt-out at any time. See our Privacy Policy and Terms.
